name: Fragment (Axel.Marelius)
description:
Fragment is a third-person Puzzle-platformer, set in the subconscious mind. It's an atmospheric and engaging playthrough of about 30 minutes time. Enjoy :) 

A Futuregames student project Made by : 
Anton Nordling 
Axel Marelius
Carl Ljungberg
Daniel Velu
Fannie Lorant
Folke Stövring Nielsen
Grimm Svenkerud
Ivan Bulygin
Linnea Olofsson
Sandy Alber
Yunis Al-Breihi

Sounds provided by: zapsplat.com
